website_summaries.verdict: Nexxus has been a popular brand since it first emerged in salons for good reasons - it's highly moisturizing and is suitable for all types of hair.
pros: Moisturizes with botanicals, caviar, and protein ingredients that nourish hair and leave it soft, shiny, and manageable
A little conditioner goes a long way
cons: Priciest set on our shortlist, but the bottles are 33.8 ounces each
A few users experienced breakouts and dry patches

customer_reviews.title: Hair Falling Out in Clumps!
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I really wanted to love this shampoo! At first I thought this was going to be my holy grail shampoo and conditioner. It left my fine hair moisturized but not weighed down. It was only after using it a few more times that I noticed my scalp was very irritated and itchy and TONS of hair kept falling out. Those were two huge red flags for me. As soon as I stopped using the shampoo and conditioner, my scalp felt better, tiny bumps from irritation around my face went away, and my hair stopped falling out in clumps. Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.author: T9_CMP87

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: Be cautious when purchasing these products. The reviews are not just for the Nexxus Shampoo and Conditioner, they are from a wide range of products sold by this seller. I've used Nexxus for a long time and loved the way it makes my hair look and feel. I've never had reactions or issues until ordering from this seller. I broke out in an allergic reaction in multiple attempts at using these products. My hair felt dry and horrible each time as well. Definitely not the same formula. Spend your money at a safe and reputable store to get these products for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Zanon

customer_reviews.title: Would not Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for my hair, all it did was dry my scalp & neck. Now I have multiple dry patches that I am trying to get rid of. They almost look like I had a chemical reaction to this product. I will never buy shampoo off of Amazon again, I will go straight to a salon to get my hair products. Waste of money that I wont get back.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Package a mess
customer_reviews.text: One of the tops was not completely closed and leaked all over the inside of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzieq981

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction and dry scalp
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed to be fine at first, but a couple month later it is starting to dry my scalp out. I had a dry itchy scalp for a couple weeks and my entire face started breaking out as well as chest. My acne has never been this bad and it was itchy as if I had an allergic reaction. I discounted using the product and immediately my scalp was calm in a sense and my face redness went down immediately. I don’t know how or what changed from the first month to the second, but I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana P

customer_reviews.title: HAIR FELL OUT IN CLUMPS!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING. I’m furious. I’ve been trying to grow my hair out for a year after it was damaged. Took vitamins for six months. Hair was looking amazing. Bought this since I used it a few years ago and loved it. MY HAIR FELL OUT IN CLUMPS. I lost a third of my hair. I thought it was stress or the new vitamins or diet... Nope. This was it. And I’m mad at myself for not realizing it right away. DO NOT BUY IT. If I had the money or time, I would sue the hell out of this company for setting me back years in hair growth. I have fine, slow-growing hair.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: IDK if this was actually nexxus
customer_reviews.text: i am unsure about this actually being what it is supposed to be i would recommend buying this type of product from an actual salon or beauty supply store as it wasnt the same as the great product i get from my local salon here it smelled a bit different and my hair wasnt as soft or tangle free as it was with the nexxus i bought here locally idk man seems pretty odd
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I was on the hunt for a new brand shampoo..read some good stuff on nexxus so I purchased. First few washes was great, left hair soft, and I have thin wavy hair..& my daughter has thick hair. At first looked blow dried after air drying. But after like the 7th wash and conditioning, MY HAIR & MY TEENAGERS HAIR felt brittle. We Do not like this shampoo and conditioner. Brittle Knotty hair. I really wanted to like this...especially with the high price. Will not be purchasing this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Love Humectress
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Humectress for FOREVER, probably close to 25 years (ugh I'm getting old) and it keeps my hair shiny and healthy; no split ends or damage from my coloring or styling, and doesn't weight it down but does help with my hair's tendency to frizz. Therrape (I'm sure I spelled that incorrectly) shampoo is a bit heavy for my hair, but I switch off between that and another one so my hair doesn't get too weighted down. It's also fairly concentrated so get a dollop and rub it in a bit then add some more water to your head else it can be hard to get it massaged in.
customer_reviews.author: Web Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Did not create any softness
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this combo for about a month. I personally like a shampoo that really froths up.... even when I use an extra pump it doesn’t lather up the way I’d like it to. It does clean the hair and smells good. I have more of an issue with the conditioner. It does not give me that soft silky feeling at all. I’m fact my hair is really difficult to comb after my shower because of the knots and tangles. I also have attempted to use more product thinking that may do the trick...but no. Honestly, cheap ol’ Suave conditioner feels better. Sorry Nexxus, but I won’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I used this shampoo and conditioner many years ago but they are not easy to find anymore. The price is lower than it was back then. The shampoo smells good but what I really like is the conditioner. This is the only conditioner I've ever used that when you're applying it your hair feels a little rough or normal. After putting it on and then rinsing it off my hair feels smooth and silky. You can just feel the difference. It's like Wow! The difference almost feels surrealistic. I highly recommend everyone to try it! They have many brands. Make sure it is the humectress one.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shampoo & Condition
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Shampoo & Condition! I've used it since the early 1980s when it came out in salons only. I have very long, thick, curly hair and it is the only shampoo and conditioner in the 100s I've tried that nourishes my hair. I try other products but always come back to these. This size pump bottle is very convenient in the shower and saves a lot of money over buying at the grocery store in smaller bottles!
customer_reviews.author: M Krenz

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo not sealed for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I just had the worst luck as the product came almost empty due to not being sealed properly. All my shampoo was lost and I couldn't even try it out. I buy Nexxus since a few years back and this had never happened before. The Conditioner is fine, didnt loose a drop, by the shampoo was not correctly sealed. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: The secret is the combination.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the Nexxus Humectress for years and really like the effects, now have tried the shampoo with the conditioner and discovered a surprising result! My hair has not looked or felt this nice in years, I have more shine, fullness and body, and more of my natural soft curls too! This shampoo is great! I will reorder and highly recommend these hair treatments for normal to dry hair with natural color. Would prefer a tamper-proof seal on my personal products but feel confident these products are genuine and untampered.
customer_reviews.author: GreenBayWI

customer_reviews.title: Conditioner has changed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product several times (using for about a year) and did not have an issue until my last shipment. The shampoo is still the same quality, but the conditioner is not. What used to leave my hair with weightless moisture now leaves it oily looking. It just won't wash out of my hair completely. I will not be buying this product again. Ranking it two stars because I do still like the shampoo. If they were not sold as a set for Amazon's subscribe and save, I would still buy it.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I thought my hair was just naturally poofy all of the time. I started using this cause I wanted salon quality shampoo and conditioner. It didn’t disappoint!! Only one week into using and my hair feels like silk, and looks tamed with out even styling. The smell last all day and I’ve never been happier!! I’ve tried almost every name brand you can think of and my hair has never had such great results, definitely will be my life long shampoo and conditioner brand.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Arleith

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry and frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner. I usually get this set at a local big box store. I found it on Amazon for the same price. I have a special routine with my hair to prevent breakage and this works well for me. It smells nice and the conditioner is great even when I color my hair. I don't wash my hair that often and I use the shampoo for scalp and roots only. It keeps my hair from getting dry and frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Lidson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Authentic, great deal. Saved at least $10 on this. Packaged sturdy no leaking. Ordered twice now and will continue: On a side not if someone is looking to purchase brand for first time. I’ll never go back to any others. I have a family of five, myself and four daughters with all long hair. One curly, one wave and the rest thick fine hair. This across the board works for all of use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Nexus for severl yers ..LOVE the product. Started buying the PUMP style and have only 1 issue: when the bottle is almost empty but still at least 7 or 8 washes left, the pump function won't work so you have to take the pump out and shake the stuff out like a ketchup bottle! I assume this is true for any pump style product. This product is too pricey to just throw way at that point! Its just a packaging function that Nexus should address. I will probably not buy the pump style again BUT will always buy Nexus.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: My go to for 32 yrs
customer_reviews.text: I'm 43 yrs old. I've been using nexxus products off & on since I was 11 yrs old. Leaves my hair silky smooth. Works great on curly hair without the nasty buildup. I've bought from this seller 4 times. Same great quality!
customer_reviews.author: LSPayor

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo/Conditioner for fine Naturally Curly Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine natural curly (ringlets) hair, and a lot of it. After years of trying multiple other brands, I started using Nexxus Hunectress This is the only Shampoo/Conditioner I have found that makes my hair look amazing, and doesn't dry it out or weigh it down. My hair dresser is always amazed at how healthy my hair is! Love it, and will continue to use this product in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Mystia31

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Soft, Healthy Hair without Oily Reside or Weight
customer_reviews.text: These two are my hair care staples! I have long blonde thin and damaged hair. This combination sustains the hair that I have in the best condition that it can be in without leaving an oily residue or anything that would weigh it down. The only thing I would like is if the conditioner would also work as a significant detangler. Apart from that this set is near perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kristenjordan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a way to do negative stars on a review. I’ve been using these products on and off since the mid 80’s and what I received is not the same. I have no way to contact the seller directly otherwise is would. This leaves your hair heavy and grungy feeling and I will never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: need to better pack
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box yesterday,very disappointed with the pack,slightly leaking. I will cancel the subscribe. I don't want to receive leaking bottles again.
customer_reviews.author: Yu xia

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again, pleasently surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I was looking for a decent brand at a good value and this product pleasently surprised me. Leaves my hair feeling healthier, softer, and more manageable than the higher priced Biologe products that I had been using. It lathers well and has a nice sent too.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was using high end shampoo and conditioner for awhile and had to cut my budget somewhere so I bought this and I love it. It’s not the stuff I used to use but it’s better than Pantene.. it smells great, I use it on myself and my toddler and her hair smells good almost all day! She also has sensitive skin and this doesn’t bother it at all.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Hair Products at ANY Price
customer_reviews.text: I started using Nexxus Therappe in the 80s. My hair is course and dry and unmanageable. After using the shampoo and conditioner my hair is noticeably softer and more manageable. I have tried many other products over the years, some of them very good, but after 30 years I am still using Nexxus Therappe and Humectress.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Futch

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this Nexxus shampoo and conditioner has worked great on my hair. I've noticed my hair has been a lot softer and I have not had any waxy build up. My only warning would be to people who have dry hair. You may want to use something that provides a bit more moisture. I typically do not have dry hair, but sometimes after I shower my hair seems a little dryer than normal. Otherwise, no complaints. I would recommend to anyone with normal hair.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Parent

customer_reviews.title: Nexxus User
customer_reviews.text: I've been using their products and I am not about to stop. Great product and price and it works for my fine hair. I am african american. I relax my hair every five months. This gives moisture to my hair. I use it as a deep conditioner and sit under the dryer (old school style). My hair is nice and healthy and growing.
customer_reviews.author: AubreyQuinn

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this duo for years. The price on Amazon is less than any department store. Great for colored hair. I no longer have frizzy hair or split ends. NOTE: I also use the other Nexxus products.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nexxus moisturizer hair care bundle
customer_reviews.text: These haircare products are excellent for putting moisture into the hair and scalp. Your hair will be moisturized, soft, and the mild coconut scent is a plus. Not to forget its a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Coggs

customer_reviews.title: I have used many different types of expensive product
customer_reviews.text: but this one is the match or better than any I have tried. For years, I used karastase, and decided to give this a try. It is better than karastase in my opinion, and it costs about 1/3 of the price. definitely recommend trying this if you have thick, curly, frizzy or unruly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E.

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: If there was a selection for zero stars I would have selected that. This product made my hair more dry and felt more damaged then before. I wish I could return this product for a full refund. I used it maybe 3 times. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Limp

customer_reviews.title: Extremely irritating
customer_reviews.text: Gave me terrible bumps allover my scalp! At first I really liked the smell and feel... But so not worth using this! Something about it made my skin break out like never before! But only around my hairline and on my scalp!! Don't buy this because it's not worth testing on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe L

customer_reviews.title: damages hair! not worth saving a few bucks on this product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money or sacrifice your hair! This product is terrible. I have used Nexxus products in the past and have had good results, I had high hopes for this line but was extremely disappointed. I have had long and health hair all my life, after using this product for two months my hair became damaged beyond repair, started falling out, was thinning! Despite not using any heat on my hair. I had to cut several inches off just to make it look halfway decent. I would never recommend this product or use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, it lasts so long! I have a lot of grey in my very fine hair, so the texture is much dryer than it used to be. This shampoo and conditioner help to keep some moisture in my hair. With a good moisturizer, my hair no longer resembles steel wool. If you're looking for a good moisturizing combo, that doesn't weigh your hair down, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: cmebloom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shampoo and conditioner!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has completely changed my dry brittle hair!!! I have hypothyroid issues which caused my hair to fall out and break off. I have since corrected my health issue and needed a shampoo that would restore my hair. I've found the best shampoo I've ever use. It does not make my hair oily or flat either. I have very fine hair. Will reorder this shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Anne16

customer_reviews.title: This is the best shampoo/conditioner. It smells sooooo good and the way ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo/conditioner. It smells sooooo good and the way my hair feels and smells afterward, makes me want bathe in this stuff. The smell lasts since I wash my hair every other day. Mine and my daughter's hair is to our lower back and super thick and a little goes a long way. I love having my hair washed at the salon because of the smell. This is THAT good. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kawibunga

customer_reviews.title: So impressed at first! Still on the fence for long term use.
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely one of the best hair products I’ve used, I think I may just be extremely picky. The first couple uses, I was amazed at how amazing my hair felt. I have a dry scalp, but it also doesn’t last too long before it gets greasy. The first couple weeks I had zero dryness and thought I found my cure! Unfortunately after a few weeks, my scalp seems to become immune or something and it’s not working as well in the beginning. Probably a personal issue with my hair and I am looking into scalp products etc in combo. It’s impossible to figure these things out it seems, kind of like skincare!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! The shampoo smells amazing, a sort of banana smell. The conditioner’s scent is not the same, since they’re technically two different lines, but it complements the shampoo. Good lather, and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Savage

customer_reviews.title: Not everything new shines.
customer_reviews.text: As a younger lady I have always used Nexxus products, But now that am in the transition of a much older me now. I have tried soo many different hair improvement treatments. Nothing compares to Nexxus products I now have control back of my hair. Healthly shine ownership.🙂
customer_reviews.author: H. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: read reviews
customer_reviews.text: I did. and didn't believe them. I LOVE this brand. So i thought i would save some money and buy on here. My HAIR IS OILY AND LOOKS DIRTY!!!!!!! After ONE wash!!!!! I am beyond unhappy as this is NOT Nexxus. DO NOT BUY unless you want to waste money like i did.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Michael Clark

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure that these are genuine Nexxus products. The shampoo literally doesn’t lather at all and is impossible to wash out. The conditioner is great if you use a huge flop of it. This stuff smells great but isn’t worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jmolina

customer_reviews.title: Received with  the condioner top open and won't pop off.
customer_reviews.text: The merchandise is good, but the top to the conditioner is defective. I have to shake it to get any out. I would like a new top sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey B. Harthcock

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality as before
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Nexxus exclusively for my curly and unruly hair with effective results. I don't know if they changed the formula or what but they no longer smell the same or work the same. I used to feel it was worth the extra money for this product, but I will no longer purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Cooney

customer_reviews.title: I've used these products before. The ones I received ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used these products before. The ones I received did not smell right at all. They stunk. Threw them away. Buyer beware here. I looked for an expiration date of some kind there was none.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but that’s it
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but that’s it. Just doesn’t work on already full and thick hair. No moisturizing at all. My husband likes it for his short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha R. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo and conditioner combo EVER
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these 2 nexxus products for YEARS.... I've tried others every once in a while to see if something better has come along...it hasn't, and I've been using Therappe and Humectress for well over 20 YEARS! It was a "solon only" purchase for many years. The fact tha they still make it after all these years is a testament to just how good they are!!!
customer_reviews.author: christine j.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the drugstore
customer_reviews.text: Less expensive than CVS and I didn't have to leave the couch. Maybe one day this week, I'll turn off the Netflix, take a shower and get out of my jammies to actually use this product Nexxus is the bomb, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri STambaugh

customer_reviews.title: My hair was like straw
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended this product because I told her my hair was like straw after months of using shower gel to wash my hair (Im a male in my 20's) My hair now looks great and feels great. Product smells good and the price is reasonable for the size of the bottles. I'll likely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Young Donnie T

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shampoo combo
customer_reviews.text: I really enioy this hair care set, it is probably my favorite. I do have to use a clarifying shampoo once a week to keep from over moisturizing. I have thick mildly curly hair, and this makes it feel so soft and healthy. This brand does not leave a residue as others do. No waxes here.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Hairdresser approved
customer_reviews.text: We love nexxus products in my family. The scents are not overpowering but still smells great and the formula doesn’t leave build up on our hair.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Fake and it gave me a horrible rash
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost certain this is a counterfeit product. I had another bottle of the product that I bought directly from Ulta and they were definitely not to same. This product is a more watery consistency and does not smell as strong. I decided to use it anyway, and was left with a horrible blistery rash on my neck and chest.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be ware, not what it seems
customer_reviews.text: The conditioner seems to be some other product, not the original formula. It's thin, has a totally different scent & leaves hair dry! Not good...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid was not screwed on!
customer_reviews.text: The lid was NOT screwed on the shampoo bottle, and it leaked everywhere, even on my front porch. What a waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn’t work correctly
customer_reviews.text: The pump at the top of the shampoo only lets out a small small amount at a time. A pea drop. It takes so long to get any out I don’t have time in the mornings to use this shampoo. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Modaro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality moisturizing shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Good quality moisturizing shampoo and conditioner. Works well for my heavily highlighted hair. If you get them both for $29 or less, it’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jlennhikes

customer_reviews.title: Leak everywhere , damage product.
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo and conditioner is good. The reason that why I gave one star is because when I got my package is damage it leak everywhere in the box, so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: annabella

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This has always been my favorite shampoo. You are not getting a great deal in price but if it is not on sale at the salon, then you might as well get it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Reina Del Rio

customer_reviews.title: Good Team
customer_reviews.text: I got introduced to this product at my beauty shop and when I found it on line I decided to order them and I'm glad to have them and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Lang

customer_reviews.title: It’s the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this shampoo & conditioner from Ulta for so much more money. It’s the same product, but cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great value, loose lids.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this product at $30 for the set. Disappointed that the lids were not screwed on tight or taped closed for shipping. Minimal leakage, but still had to rinse off bottles after unpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Cukrowicz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like bananas and worked well for softening hair, but not necessarily mine. Need something with a ton more moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Bahar Basaga

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Love nexxus and this was a amazing bundle price. My hair always feels amazing after using this. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie klump

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I am unsure if this is actual Humectress. I’ve been using this product for 30 years. The color is incorrect, the consistency different and smell changed. This does not work like the product I am used to. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed. The next day my hair felt oily and dirty as if I hadn't washed it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Elchin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, I don’t have to use as much for the effect.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair feel wonderful, I have tried about a million different products. Finally found something that works for me. I color my waste long hair about once a month. It’s important that I use the right stuff. I finally decided to upgrade to salon shampoo, I made the righ choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nexxus from Target or Walmart for many years and love it so I thought I would cheap out and by this product from Amazon. This product is not the same as the Nexxus I buy at Target!!! My hair smells like it did when I used to get Permanents. YUCK! Makes me wonder what chemical is in the product. Be wise and pay the extra money at Walmart or Target.
customer_reviews.author: C Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Burned skin..
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad experience with this product thinking I was allergic to it but the more read other people's reviews I see it happening to others. Not only did my hair not feel any different than before using the product, I broke out in hive like burn welts everywhere within days of using product. Like chemical burns. Stopped using product and now they are slowly going away! Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: poor packaging by Nexxus NOT amazon
customer_reviews.text: Not amazon's fault, problem is at nexxus factory. I ordered 3 combo packs, and all 3 the conditioner bottles were 1 full turn loose, didn't loose much but aggravating and a bit of a mess
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Solid shampoo and conditioner. It makes it very easy to get a comb through my hair and prevents split ends. Very conditioning. And love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H. McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: It all depends on your hair type.
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair feel dry and uncontrollable. Will not buy again. It all depends on your hair type. Now I get a curling shampoo which smooths my curls making my hair manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Cicero

customer_reviews.title: Hair strengthening
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for a couple years now and it has definitely helped my hair grow! And if you have curly hair that gets tangled this is the perfect shampoo and conditioner ! It always leaves my hair soft!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: My wife is loving this product so far. It's a little pricey in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent and silky softness
customer_reviews.text: This might be my new favorite shampoo and conditioner set. The smell if fresh and leaves my hair smelling good all day. My hair feels soft and hydrated even after day 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how it makes my hair so soft and not dry.
customer_reviews.author: Twinx

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner was recommended by my salon. After purchasing, I noticed a big difference in the look and feel of my hair. It is softer and shinier now.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this isnt the real product. doesnt even smell the same!! I'm going to return mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: You have to use a lot of shampoo. I just got out the shower and my hair is still oily . Way too much money for how it works .
customer_reviews.author: Cella4u17

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and conditioner! Have loved Nexxus hair products for several years.
customer_reviews.author: TeeWill

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo and conditioner ever!
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair unbelievably soft and shiny. I will never use anything else on my hair except these two products. Can’t beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: gary studeny

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Nexxus is the best hair product I’ve used to date. Strengthens hair while keeping it silky smooth. It is a little on the expensive side, but it becomes a bang for your buck situation with this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. But it did come messy. Shampoo was leaking everywhere in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Thick Hair, Nexxus don't care
customer_reviews.text: Won't use anything else. This stuff is the bees knees for my thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Love this duo
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good and leaves your hair feeling so soft.
customer_reviews.author: reviews by me

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: my hair was entangled all the time and now sometimes I don't even brush it and my fingers just combs through them in the morning and I'm good to go (I have naturally straight hair and I don't do anything with it with a blunt chop for low maintenance). lasting soft, clean, light hair that doesn't turn greasy for longer.. Also got this to nourish my hair to hope that the hair fall reduces - seems to be working! love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayliescomet

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I use this for 2 years I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Best product!!
customer_reviews.text: Best products ever! My hair is healthy, strong abd beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I damaged my hair from home coloring and these products helped to repair it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Wooowwwwww
customer_reviews.text: Woooooowwww what a great product my hair looks amazing and I am a guy to let you know.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Bottles were damaged and shampoo was everywhere in the box .

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Nexus fan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hair products. Well designed pump, keeps pumping until practically no product remains.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I love Nexxus and this has been the least expensive way to purchase it that I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality product. Leaves my hair feeling greasy and heavy after one day. It's such a pain to have to return but I'm going to do it. This stuff is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: BRAD NORMAN

customer_reviews.title: Value for your moneys worth (: !!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow !!! This product not only got to me perfectly after seeing thoes bad reviews 😩 I'm very excited to be trying these out they have an awesome smell to it and the size is just right !
customer_reviews.author: George Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good , I have really bad dry hair and I can notice it getting softer , doesn’t really have a smell , but it came in nothing was broken or opened . Great product I will for sure get more
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This product actually dried out my hair. Once I stopped using it and switched to a different (less expensive) product, I had better results.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Shampoo and Conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I watched a video about this combo before ordering them I love them!!! my hair is soft ad shinny and super hydrate!

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair soft and fresh. Does not make it greasy and has a nice light scent to it. Fast shipping as well!

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Love this, really good product, my hair is soft and hydrated
customer_reviews.author: Aly

product_meta.title: Nexxus Moisturizing Shampoo and Conditioner For Normal to Dry Hair Therappe Humectress Silicone-Free 33.8 oz, 2 count
product_meta.description:
Nexxus Therappe Ultimate Moisture Shampoo and Humectress Ultimate Moisture Conditioner for normal to dry hair help revitalize hair. Salon-crafted with Nexxus’ exclusive Caviar & Protein Complex, this shampoo and conditioner pair helps nourish hair and deliver deep hydration, fortifying the surface of hair to lock moisture in for 24 hours. Moisture Shampoo has a lightweight silicone-free formula that revitalizes hair without weighing it down to help give hair the flexibility and suppleness to retains its natural movement. Ultimate Moisture Conditioner provides advanced conditioning to help replenish and reawaken hair, unleashing your hair’s natural smoothness all day long. Repairing hair is a multi-step process. For best results, apply Moisture Shampoo to damp hair, massaging into a rich lather before rinsing thoroughly. Follow with the Humectress Conditioner, smoothing onto wet hair and waiting 3 minutes before rinsing. Both Therapy Ultimate Moisture Shampoo and Humectress Ultimate Moisture Conditioner are suitable for everyday use. A leader in salon-quality hair products, Nexxus uses learnings from science and nature. We know that hair is made of almost 90% proteins, which is why we use advanced scientific methods to identify the protein needs of each hair type and create customized formulas with proteins to bring your hair back to life.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Nexxus Therappe Shampoo Plus Humectress Combo Pack view larger Luxurious Moisturizing Hair Care products restore and maintain vital moisture, leaving hair looking and feeling touchable soft and vibrantly healthy. Therappe Luxurious Moisturizing Shampoo, now enhanced for superior salon performance and advanced moisturization, is specially formulated with rosemary, chamomile and nettle, to gently cleanse for nourished, healthy looking hair. 

NEXXUS LUXURIOUS MOISTURIZING HAIR CARE PRODUCTS 
Restore and maintain vital moisture, leaving hair looking and feeling touchably soft and vibrantly healthy. 

THERAPPE LUXURIOUS MOISTURIZING SHAMPOO
Fortified with exclusive NexxuSphere time released technology, containing nutrients, antioxidants, and UV protectors.

Styling Recommendation: Apply shampoo to damp hair. Massage into hair and scalp. Rinse with lukewarm water. Follow with Humectress Ultimate Moisturizing Conditioner.

HUMCTRESS ULTIMATE MOISTURIZING CONDITIONER
Now enhanced for an elevated level of miniaturization, Humectress Ultimate Moisturizing Conditioner is specially formulated with Vitamin E, coconut oil and honey extract to provide nourishing moisture leaving hair luxuriously soft, manageable and full of lustre.

Styling Recommendation: Apply to damp hair. Comb through. Leave in for 3 minutes. Rinse with lukewarm water. For best results, shampoo with Therappe Luxurious Moisturizing Shampoo.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Nexxus Therappe Shampoo Plus Humectress Combo Pack.

KEY FEATURES
 * Each combo pack comes with one Therappe Shampoo and one Humectress Conditioner
 * Therappe Shampoo, for salon performance and advanced moisturization, is specially formulated with rosemary, chamomile and nettle
 * Humectress Conditioner, with Vitamin E, coconut oil, and honey extract, provides nourishing moisture, leaving hair luxuriously soft, manageable, and full of lustre
 * For best results, treat your hair with the full line of Nexxus Humectress leave-in conditioners and conditioning treatments
feature_bullets: Nexxus Caviar Complex Shampoo and Conditioner for normal to dry hair helps replenish hair with ultimate moisture.
Salon-crafted with Nexxus' Caviar & Protein Complex, this shampoo and conditioner help lock moisture into hair for 24 hours.
Nexxus Therappe Ultimate Moisture shampoo is silicone-free.
Nexxus Humectress Ultimate Moisture conditioner helps replenish and repair hair, unleashing hair's natural smoothness all day long.
This advanced shampoo and conditioner pair works together to help repair hair.
Nexxus hair products were born in salons and perfected by science, using high-performing technology and precious ingredients.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
